rows.label: bf02420100_0010
rows.name: I don't think they're following us.

rows.label: bf02420100_0020
rows.name: Perhaps we're safe for now.

rows.label: bf02420100_0030
rows.name:
You're right. We should get some rest.
I can't go any further.

rows.label: bf02420100_0040
rows.name: Ahh... Tora is pooped as well... *yawn*

rows.label: bf02420100_0050
rows.name: See you later.

rows.label: bf02420100_0060
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]-Uh?

rows.label: bf02420100_0070
rows.name:
We are grateful for all you've done.
We wish you well on your travels.

rows.label: bf02420100_0080
rows.name: Farewell.

rows.label: bf02420100_0090
rows.name: I want to reach Eden!

rows.label: bf02420100_0100
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf02420100_0110
rows.name:
I made a promise.
I'm taking Homura to Eden.

rows.label: bf02420100_0120
rows.name:
It's just... She gave half of her life to save mine.
I owe her.

rows.label: bf02420100_0130
rows.name: Rex-

rows.label: bf02420100_0140
rows.name: But half the world seems to be after her.

rows.label: bf02420100_0150
rows.name:
With the Divine Beasts dying off,
living space is running out...

rows.label: bf02420100_0160
rows.name:
That's gonna start wars. And people need weapons
to fight wars.

rows.label: bf02420100_0170
rows.name: That's why they want her.

rows.label: bf02420100_0190
rows.name:
If I can prove Eden exists, maybe I can
stop the war that's coming.

rows.label: bf02420100_0200
rows.name:
But...
Fighting Meleph taught me something.

rows.label: bf02420100_0210
rows.name: I can't protect Homura with just my own power.

rows.label: bf02420100_0220
rows.name: Nia - you're a Driver.

rows.label: bf02420100_0230
rows.name: Please lend us your power.

rows.label: bf02420100_0235
rows.name: ...if you wanted?

rows.label: bf02420100_0240
rows.name: Eden? Do you really believe in that?

rows.label: bf02420100_0250
rows.name:
Well, Homura told me that she was born there.
Yet here she is.

rows.label: bf02420100_0260
rows.name: So it must exist, right?

rows.label: bf02420100_0270
rows.name: Your logic is almost as good as Morph's.

rows.label: bf02420100_0275
rows.name:
Listen, Rex, I don't know if you're stupid or
just too nice for your own good.

rows.label: bf02420100_0280
rows.name: But what if Homura's just lying?

rows.label: bf02420100_0290
rows.name:
What if this is all an act, and one day she turns
round and eats your head off.

rows.label: bf02420100_0300
rows.name: Homura wouldn't do that!

rows.label: bf02420100_0310
rows.name: Of course I wouldn't, that'd destroy my stomach...

rows.label: bf02420100_0320
rows.name:
So...serious... She...
Bwahaha!

rows.label: bf02420100_0330
rows.name:
An emerald Core Crystal is the
sign of the Holy Grail, huh...?

rows.label: bf02420100_0340
rows.name: Sure, why not. This could be interesting.

rows.label: bf02420100_0350
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: bf02420100_0360
rows.name: My lady!

rows.label: bf02420100_0370
rows.name:
I kinda wanna see this Eden for
myself now. Maybe it really does exist?

rows.label: bf02420100_0380
rows.name: It does!

rows.label: bf02420100_0390
rows.name: An endless field of green among the clouds, eh?

rows.label: bf02420100_0400
rows.name: If the legends are true, even people like me...
